title: FPS Drops
body: Prior to this patch I had a nearly constant 144 capped fps that would dip into the low 100s whenit passed around 40 mins however now when i enter a game I get only about 80 fps and even at that it seems as if it goes lower without showing as it just feels clunky every once in a while. I have tried to play on lower settings yet it still has the same fps and when I repaired it didn't seem to help. My drivers are up to date and I have used CCleaner yet it still remains the same. The pc hasn't been overheating and I play on a GTX 960 and have a AMD FX 6300 6 core processor. Pls help

replies.body:
It seems like you've done a great deal of troubleshooting on your own end already. Sometimes your FPS can drop due to something small like unneeded programs running in the background or even just needing to defragment your harddrive. 

You hit most of the steps already but check out the rest of the info in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)). Let me know if that helps!
